item.title: 股市下滑，中国主要国有银行捍卫人民币——消息人士
item.description: China's major state-owned banks were heavy sellers of dollars on Wednesday, three people with direct knowledge of their activity said, steadying the yuan as it came under pressure in currency trade as the economy remains shaky.翻译:三名直接了解其活动的人士表示，中国主要国有银行周三大量抛售美元，稳定了人民币汇率，因为经济仍然不稳定，人民币在货币贸易中面临压力。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 政变三年后，缅甸军政府首脑面临前所未有的压力
item.description: In mid-January, at a small gathering in a cantonment town in Myanmar, hard line pro-military monk Pauk Kotaw suggested that the country's junta chief Min Aung Hlaing step down and his deputy take over. The crowd cheered in agreement, according to videos of the event posted on social media.翻译:一月中旬，在缅甸一个军营城镇的一次小型集会上，强硬派亲军事僧人包克托建议该国军政府领导人敏昂莱下台，由他的副手接任。根据社交媒体上发布的活动视频，人群欢呼雀跃。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 亚玛芬体育对中国的依赖对 2024 年首次大规模 IPO 构成压力 - 消息人士
item.description: Amer Sports' growing reliance on China for its revenue is weighing on the appetite of those considering buying into the sporting equipment maker's $1.8 billion U.S. initial public offering (IPO), four people involved in the process told Reuters.翻译:四名参与该过程的人士告诉路透社，亚玛芬体育 (Amer Sports) 的收入日益依赖中国，这正在影响那些考虑购买这家体育器材制造商 18 亿美元美国首次公开募股 (IPO) 的投资者的兴趣。
item.author: Echo Wang

item.title: 评级机构：恒大的债券持有人可能要等待数年才能获得微薄的支付
item.description: China Evergrande's offshore dollar bondholders stand to receive a potentially tiny payout in a complicated process that could take years to play out after the property giant was placed in liquidation, according to S&P Global Ratings.翻译:标准普尔全球评级表示，中国恒大的离岸美元债券持有人将在一个复杂的过程中获得潜在的微额支付，该过程在这家房地产巨头进入清算后可能需要数年时间才能完成。
item.author: Scott Murdoch

item.title: 由于担心恒大的影响，中国推出新的房地产支持措施
item.description: A state-backed property project in China has received the first development loan under Beijing's so-called "whitelist" mechanism and two major cities have eased home-buying curbs, state media reported, as concerns mount about the liquidation of Evergrande.翻译:据官方媒体报道，随着对恒大清算的担忧加剧，中国的一个国家支持的房地产项目已根据北京所谓的“白名单”机制获得了第一笔开发贷款，两个主要城市也放松了购房限制。
item.author: Clare Jim, Liangping Gao

item.title: 中国主要城市放宽购房限制以促进销售
item.description: Two of China's major cities, Suzhou and Shanghai, followed Guangzhou in easing home-buying restrictions, in an effort to boost property sales as persistent weakness in confidence delays a recovery in the crisis-hit property sector.翻译:中国的两个主要城市苏州和上海跟随广州放松了购房限制，以促进房地产销售，因为信心持续疲软阻碍了受危机打击的房地产行业的复苏。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾总统告诉教皇方济各，她支持他对人工智能的担忧
item.description: Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen has written to Pope Francis offering support for his concerns over the use of artificial intelligence (AI) and pledging deeper cooperation with the island's sole European ally.翻译:台湾总统蔡英文已致信教皇方济各，支持他对人工智能使用的担忧，并承诺与台湾唯一的欧洲盟友进行更深入的合作。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国称激怒台湾的气球“不是什么新鲜事”
item.description: China's government on Wednesday dismissed repeated complaints by Taiwan about Chinese balloons flying over or near the island, saying they are for meteorological purposes and should not be hyped up for political reasons.翻译:中国政府周三驳回了台湾多次对中国热气球飞越或靠近该岛的抱怨，称这些热气球是出于气象目的，不应出于政治原因大肆宣传。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国对南海黄岩岛拥有无可争辩的主权-海岸警卫队
item.description: China has indisputable sovereignty over the Scarborough Shoal and its adjacent waters, and has always resolutely countered infringements by the Philippines, a spokesperson for China Coast Guard said in a statement released late Tuesday.翻译:中国海警局新闻发言人周二晚间发表声明称，中国对黄岩岛及其附近海域拥有无可争辩的主权，对菲律宾的侵犯行为一贯予以坚决反击。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国官员表示，太平洋岛屿需要加强数字安全才能加入海底电缆
item.description: Pacific Islands nations that want to connect to U.S.-funded undersea cables will need to secure their digital ecosystems to guard against data risks from China, a senior U.S. State Department official said.翻译:美国国务院一位高级官员表示，想要连接美国资助的海底电缆的太平洋岛屿国家需要确保其数字生态系统的安全，以防范来自中国的数据风险。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 由于中国经济拖累，亚洲股市月度下跌；联邦公开市场委员会迫在眉睫
item.description: Asian shares fell broadly on Wednesday, while the Australian dollar slid after surprisingly soft inflation data and Japanese government bond (JGB) yields ticked higher on growing bets of an imminent policy shift from the Bank of Japan (BOJ).翻译:亚洲股市周三普遍下跌，而澳元在通胀数据出人意​​料疲软后下跌，而日本政府债券（JGB）收益率因对日本央行（BOJ）即将实施政策转变的预期不断上升而走高。
item.author: Rae Wee

item.title: 国际货币基金组织认为亚洲有降息空间，敦促中国明确房地产修复措施
item.description: Asian central banks may see scope to loosen monetary policy later this year as inflation moderates, the International Monetary Fund said on Wednesday and called on China to give a clear message in how it plans to address its property woes.翻译:国际货币基金组织周三表示，随着通胀放缓，亚洲央行可能会在今年晚些时候看到放松货币政策的空间，并呼吁中国就计划如何解决房地产问题发出明确信息。
item.author: Leika Kihara

item.title: 油价因中国数据疲软而下跌，但有望自 9 月以来首次月度上涨
item.description: Oil prices fell on Wednesday as lacklustre economic activity in China, the world's biggest crude importer, weighed on sentiment, but prices were set for their first monthly gain since September as broadening Middle East conflicts raised supply concerns.翻译:由于全球最大原油进口国中国经济活动低迷打压市场情绪，油价周三下跌，但由于中东冲突扩大引发供应担忧，油价预计将出现 9 月份以来的首次月度上涨。
item.author: Colleen Howe, Muyu Xu

item.title: 中国工厂活动再次萎缩，需求疲软拖累经济
item.description: China's manufacturing activity contracted for the fourth straight month in January, an official factory survey showed on Wednesday, suggesting the sprawling sector and the broader economy were struggling to regain momentum at the start of 2024.翻译:周三的官方工厂调查显示，中国 1 月份制造业活动连续第四个月萎缩，这表明庞大的行业和更广泛的经济在 2024 年初难以恢复增长势头。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大雾导致中国港口暂停航运；上海发布加强咨询
item.description: Heavy fog has suspended the operation of ships travelling through the Qiongzhou Strait off the coast of China's Guangdong province and several cities, including Shanghai, have issued warning advisories, Chinese state media reported on Wednesday.翻译:据中国官方媒体周三报道，大雾导致穿越中国广东省沿海琼州海峡的船只暂停航行，包括上海在内的多个城市已发布警告公告。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 新西兰外长：美国需要在太平洋地区加强合作
item.description: New Zealand will start talks on Wednesday with Australia about cooperating with the AUKUS trilateral defence partnership, Foreign Minister Winston Peters said, adding Washington needed to do more in the Pacific to counter other political influences there.翻译:新西兰外交部长温斯顿·彼得斯表示，新西兰将于周三开始与澳大利亚就与 AUKUS 三边防务伙伴关系的合作进行谈判，并补充说华盛顿需要在太平洋地区采取更多行动，以对抗那里的其他政治影响。
item.author: Lucy Craymer

item.title: 美元在美联储之前坚挺
item.description: The dollar headed for its biggest monthly gain since September and the yen for its sharpest drop in over a year on Wednesday, as traders waited on a U.S. rates decision to round out January.翻译:周三，美元创九月以来最大月度涨幅，日元创一年多以来最大跌幅，交易员等待美国一月份利率决定。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 中国副总理敦促在市场暴跌之际加大对上市公司的支持
item.description: Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng on Monday called for greater support for listed companies in an effort to help stabilise capital markets, the Xinhua News Agency reported, amid a protracted stock market rout.翻译:据新华社报道，在股市持续暴跌之际，中国国务院副总理何立峰周一呼吁加大对上市公司的支持，以帮助稳定资本市场。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国护照持有者可以免签前往哪些国家？
item.description: China, since reopening its borders in 2023 after three years of self-imposed isolation due to COVID-19, has sealed visa waiver pacts with select countries to encourage travel of its citizens, a boon to foreign destinations wooing Chinese tourists.翻译:中国因新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 自我隔离三年，并于 2023 年重新开放边境，并与部分国家签署了免签证协议，以鼓励其公民旅行，这对吸引中国游客的外国目的地来说是一个福音。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大承认香港法院的清算令
item.description: China Evergrande on Monday acknowledged a Hong Kong court's decision ordering the liquidation of the world's most indebted property developer after it failed to offer a concrete restructuring plan more than two years after defaulting on a bond payment.翻译:中国恒大周一承认，香港法院下令对这家全球负债最重的房地产开发商进行清算，原因是该公司在拖欠债券两年多后未能提供具体的重组计划。
item.author: Reuters
